lead_paragraph: Abby Wambach scored two goals and Carli Lloyd also scored, leading the United States past Sweden, 3-2, last night in Vila Real De Santo Antonio, Portugal, for a place in the Algarve Cup final. Lloyd has four goals in the tournament. The United States, which won the tournament in 2000 and from 2003 to 2005, will play Denmark in tomorrow’s final. Denmark advanced despite a 3-0 loss to Germany.
